function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ambiguous pollution prevention descriptions in sustainable buildings criterion","Impact":"Inadequate prevention of contamination sources","Mitigation":"Provide clear and detailed pollution prevention guidelines and definitions","Technologies":"Water treatment technologies, pollution monitoring systems","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building developers, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of wastewater management strategies in BREEAM guidance","Impact":"Increased risk of water pollution from inadequate wastewater management","Mitigation":"Develop and incorporate wastewater management strategies into BREEAM guidelines","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment systems, greywater recycling technologies","People":"Local communities, environmental agencies","Owner":"BREEAM administrators"}]}
